dublin_core.dcvalue: Universal standard goniometer is an essential tool to measure articulations range of motion ROM In this time of technological advances and increasing use of smartphones new measurement s tools appear as specific smartphone applications This article compares the iOS application Knee Goniometer with universal standard goniometer to assess knee ROM To our knowledge this is the first study that uses a goniometer application in a clinical context The purpose of this study is to determine if this application could be used in clinical practice
[Measurement of the knee range of motion: standard goniometer or smartphone?].
